name: IHOP 55+ Menu
description: Special 55+ menu with value pricing on breakfast favorites
fullDescription: IHOP offers a 55+ menu featuring smaller portions of popular items at reduced prices. Available at participating locations for guests aged 55 and older.
whatTheyOffer:
- 55+ menu with reduced pricing
- Smaller portion sizes
- Breakfast favorites included
- Available all day at most locations
- No coupon or membership required
howToGetIt:
1. Visit participating IHOP location
2. Request the 55+ menu
3. Ages 55 and older eligible
4. Order from special menu
5. Availability may vary by location
keywords: IHOP, senior discount, 55+, senior menu, restaurant, breakfast, pancakes, affordable meals
